doc:
Richard Jenkins https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Jenkins 0 Richard Dale Jenkins (born May 4, 1947) is an American actor. Jenkins began his acting career in theater at the Trinity Repertory Company and later made his film debut in 1974. He has worked steadily in film and television since the 1980s, mostly in supporting roles. His first major role did not come until the early 2000s, when he portrayed the deceased patriarch Nathaniel Fisher on the HBO funeral drama series Six Feet Under (2001–2005). He is also known for his roles in the films Burn After Reading (2008), Step Brothers (2008), Let Me In (2010), and Jack Reacher (2012). Jenkins was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor for the drama film The Visitor (2007). He won the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Miniseries or a Movie for the limited drama series Olive Kitteridge (2014). For his performance in the fantasy drama film The Shape of Water (2017), Jenkins received Academy Award, Golden Globe and Screen Actors Guild Award nominations for Best Supporting Actor. Richard_Dale_Jenkins ( born May_4_,_1947 ) is an_American_actor . Jenkins began his_acting_career in theater at the_Trinity_Repertory_Company and later made his_film_debut in 1974 . He has_worked steadily in film_and_television since the_1980s , mostly_in supporting roles . His_first_major_role did_not_come until the_early_2000s , when he portrayed the_deceased_patriarch_Nathaniel_Fisher on the_HBO_funeral_drama_series_Six_Feet Under (_2001 – 2005_) . He is_also_known for his_roles in the_films Burn After Reading (_2008_) , Step_Brothers_(_2008_) , Let Me In (_2010_) , and Jack_Reacher ( 2012_) . Jenkins was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actor for the_drama_film The_Visitor_(_2007_) . He won the_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Lead_Actor in a_Miniseries or a_Movie for the_limited_drama_series_Olive_Kitteridge_(_2014_) . For his_performance in the_fantasy_drama_film The_Shape of Water_(_2017_) , Jenkins received Academy_Award , Golden_Globe_and_Screen_Actors_Guild_Award_nominations for_Best_Supporting_Actor .
